Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed with exceptional quality and functionality in mind. This product not only meets but exceeds industry standards, providing unparalleled performance and durability. Considering its robust features and long-lasting value, we believe it's worth more than its face value. For you, I am offering this product at an exclusive introductory price of $150. It's a fantastic opportunity to experience the best without breaking the bank. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-tier product. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
